programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 63
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: Aprils Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: LetMeFly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Shrink O Matic
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy TM sneak into Victors secret laboratory looking for adventure and discover his newest experiment The Shrinkomatic! Just as Victor gets back and discovers the Creepy Candy TM they accidentally activate the shrink ray with hilarious consequences. Will they be able return to their normal size before Miss Paige finds out? Tune into this exciting episode to see how the mystery ends!

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Heir To Stay
programme.desc: Sundar cleaning out the front of the shop is surprised to find a cheeky-faced snot-digging kid glaring at him bossily. Turns out its Chai Rajas one and only nephew whom the man dotes on but is in fact pest incarnate as far as Sundar is concerned. Pakru, the boy acts as if he owns the shop and finds inventive ways of harassing Sundar. Basha is amused and happily tries to help himself to some freebies while Sundar is kept occupied. But then, Basha receives a rude shock when Pakru extends his nastiness towards Basha as well! There is chaos in the shop as Pakru, being sly manages to out-think even the normally nifty Basha. Its complete chaos and the seething Basha decides to team up with Sundar and teach the bully Pakru a thing or two about defending ones territory. Pakru sensing this believes he has outprank them, but Basha and Sundar use the ace up their sleeve- their knowledge of Chai Rajas habits. With each passing minute, Chai Raja finds his favourite kettle smashed, his fritters burnt, his clocks spring sprung, his favourite spatula missing and each time Pakru is implicated! Finally losing his cool, Chai Raja boots Pakru out and Sundar gleefully turns to hi-five Basha- but the naughty monkey is already raiding the snack-shelf again! With an angry snarl, Sundar chases at Basha as the chai chai tune plays in the background.

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: King Pancake
programme.desc: PANCAKE wishes he could be king so that he alone could tell everyone else what to do – only to learn that being in charge isn’t as easy as it looks. Both leaders and helpers are needed to finish any job. Giving orders and taking orders are both important to get a job done.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: The Return of The Stareoffolous
programme.desc: Odessa can’t seem to lose the Stareoffolous in a game of hide-and-seek. Finding the goodness in everyone/everything.

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Val the vampire
programme.desc: During Halloween the twins visit a young vampire who cannot manage being scary. They will realize this is only because she never cleans her vampire teeth!

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Agent Alpha One
programme.desc: The Super Commander orders Brains to host a special member of the Protectors, Agent Alpha One--a dashing agent Brains admires—who turns out to be both a phony, a problem, and…and actor?

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: The Great Conspiracy
programme.desc: All of Braianna’s enemies are brought together by the villainous Egghead. Brains is trying to get promoted, even though a higher title would mean she’d have to move away.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Braianna-Bot
programme.desc: When Friday transforms into Braianna to cover for her absence at school, it gives her a chance to observe how people react to her.

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: I got Taller
programme.desc: Scot makes fun of Duda for being short. Annoyed, Duda tries everything to grow. Finally, he asks Scot for help. Scot says he knows a magic spell that makes you taller. It is a spell that only works in the afternoon and when it is sunny. So Duda does everything Scot tells him to do and sees that his shadow has gotten taller. His sudden growth gives Duda the strength and courage to help his friends in need. But when his shadow disappears at night, Duda feels worthless and depressed because he has returned to his little self. Soon, Scot appears and blurts out that he has invented the magic spell that makes Doubt question all of his heroic acts that day. If Duda didnt grow up, then how did he help all his friends?

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: Pasaporte a la vida
programme.desc: Oleg ayuda a Alena y como agradecimiento le pide que contraiga con él un matrimonio de convivencia.

programme.title: Pasaporte a la vida
programme.desc: Oleg ayuda a Alena y como agradecimiento le pide que contraiga con él un matrimonio de convivencia.

programme.title: Pasaporte a la vida
programme.desc: Oleg ayuda a Alena y como agradecimiento le pide que contraiga con él un matrimonio de convivencia.

programme.title: Aquí viene la novia
programme.desc: Para ayudar a su padre, Irina acepta organizar la boda de Juliana, pero descubre que el novio es su ex.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Motelier
programme.desc: Da-hui, a "motelier" working at a love motel located in the heart of Seoul, hosts a podcast to share the incredible stories she witnesses at her job. From a young couple's struggles to have their first time to two curious girlfriends' trials of various adult toys, the stories she shares are full of cute, fun, silly, and sexy moments.

programme.title: Starting a Dangerous Life in a Shared House
programme.desc: Sun Min, who has a cranky personality, makes problem and withdraws from the idol group. Sun Min avoids people and becomes a closed character through a series of events. But his economic situation is getting worse, so he finds people who live together in his house. Because his home is his the last self-pride.

programme.title: Go Back
programme.desc: Ji-won, a motivated new police officer, is strangely bothered after meeting O-sun, a social worker. On a hot summer day, a kidnapper sends a message saying, âIf you want to save the kidnapped child, donate money to the welfare center.â The incident becomes a national concern as the media report it. Somehow, Ji-won doubts the link between the case and O-sun.

programme.title: Cover The Spread
programme.desc: When the odds are against you, face the battle anyway. In “Cover The Spread,” Pastor Steven Furtick challenges us to turn our problems into petitions — because God’s got the answer.

programme.title: God Has Given Me Everything I Need For The Season I'm In
programme.desc: Take inventory of what you already have. Join Pastor Holly Furtick as she unpacks how to trust God with your now as He prepares you for what’s next.

programme.title: Where You Meet With God
programme.desc: Don’t go for a goal without God this year. When you invite His presence in, He’ll be with you every step of the way, bringing things to the surface, and showing you what to reach for.

programme.title: When You Just Can't Win
programme.desc: If you’re feeling stuck in a cycle of defeat, remember that God’s promises are guaranteed but not automatic. Keep consistently showing up and praising Him for the victories He’s given you, because more are on the way.
